Notes: core blockbuilding case; pair gem on top with shell on bottom, keeping DL corners bottom color
Best Alg Notes: maximal blockbuild - pair shell on bottom with gem on top to get tent/tent

Notes: good scottie/bird; always align so that scottie's head is touching slice without splitting its body, and the bottom layer's shell is untouched.  this case goes to dish/dish because it splits the half on bottom
Recognition Notes: good scottie/bird; the clean slice between the tent and corner on top breaks squareshape when preserving the half on bottom
Best Alg Notes: position isolated corner on top next to the slice, and hold D half in DL; first move trades isolated corner on top with two edges on bottom to make dish/dish

Notes: bad scottie/bird; always align so that scottie's head is touching slice without splitting its body, and the bottom layer's shell is untouched.  this case goes to snoopy/gem because it sends corner on top next to fully-preserved half on bottom
Recognition Notes: bad scottie/bird; the clean slice between the tent and corner on top preserves squareshape when preserving the half on bottom
Best Alg Notes: position isolated corner on top next to the slice, and preserve D half in DL; first move trades isolated corner on top with isolated edge on bottom to make snoopy/gem
Parents: Left Snoopy / Gem; Right Whale / Left Tent; Left Scottie / Shell; Left Pinwheel / Left Kite

Notes: switch isolated corner on top with hazard corners on bottom; slice should touch (but not split) edge from tent on top
Best Alg Notes: switch isolated corner on top with hazard corners on bottom; slice should be next to edge from tent on top without splitting it
Parents: Left Baron / Left Baron; Right Scottie / Left Bird; Moth / Plane
